{
  "host": "hexlet.io",
  "timeout": 50,
  "proxy": "123.234.53.22",
  "follow": false
}


{
  "timeout": 20,
  "verbose": true,
  "host": "hexlet.io"
}


{'follow': {'diff-': False},
 'host': 'hexlet.io',
 'proxy': {'diff-': '123.234.53.22'},
 'timeout': {'diff+': 20, 'diff-': 50},
 'verbose': {'diff+': True}}


{
  - follow: false
    host: hexlet.io
  - proxy: 123.234.53.22
  - timeout: 50
  + timeout: 20
  + verbose: true
}


Property 'follow' was removed
Property 'proxy' was removed
Property 'timeout' was updated. From '50' to '20'
Property 'verbose' was added with value: true


{
  "follow__removed": false,
  "proxy__removed": "123.234.53.22",
  "timeout__updated": {
    "new": 20,
    "old": 50
  },
  "verbose__added": true
}
